q12.quiz: Which one of the statements is true?

q13.name: inner classes
q13.quiz: Which one of the statements is true?
q13.a: Inner classes cannot access attributes and methods of the outer class.
q13.b: An inner class cannot be static.
q13.c: An inner class can be private or protected.

q14.a: Abstract class is a restricted class that cannot be used to create objects.
q14.b: An abstract class can only have regular methods.
q14.c: An abstract class can only have abstract methods.

q1.name: catch exceptions
q1.quiz: When there are multiple catch blocks after one try block, what will happen when that try block throws an error?
q1.a: Only one of them will be executed.
q1.b: All of them will be executed.
q1.c: one or more of them will be executed.

q2.name: throw exceptions
q2.quiz: When a function throws an exception and that function does not catch the exception, what will happen?
q2.b: It will keep being thrown to the last function that invoked it until it is caught.
q2.c: It will only be thrown to the nearest function.
